title: Jeremy Edwards leaves viewers cringing on X Factor: Celebrity as he bites back at judges
text:
Jeremy Edwards was left fuming at the judges comments (Picture: ITV)

Jeremy Edwards teamed up with former Strictly dancer Brendan Cole on The X Factor: Celebrity, but it seems like he didn’t have the most enjoyable time.

The 48-year-old actor, most known for playing Kurt Benson in Hollyoaks, formed a duo with Brendan to audition for the show, where they sang a cover of Kylie Minogue’s Love At First Sight.

Before the pair sang, however, judge Louis Walsh appeared to have irked Jeremy after failing to recognise who he was.

‘I know you, you’re off Strictly Come Dancing,’ Louis said, pointing to Brendan.

‘Brendan and? Jeremy, what show are you on?’

In response, Jeremy said: ‘I’m currently on Millie Inbetween, the number one kids show in the country. I’ve just been around.’

After the performance, and some negative feedback from Howie Mandel and Randy Jackson, Simon Cowell added: ‘Can I say something? I believe the most important thing is who do the public want to see through? The audience who have watched you Brendan in particular.’

Looking at Jeremy, Simon added: ‘I don’t know you so well, but 16 million people have watched you every week. Let’s not forget that.’

Jeremy Edwards was left fuming (Picture: ITV)

Speaking after the critique among the other contestants, Jeremy was clearly upset by the negative reaction, saying: ‘They were really mean and that’s upsetting because it’s like okay we’re trying.

‘We’re off the TV in England and people know us and they love us.

‘I don’t know that was a bit mean. I don’t like people being mean.’

Viewers however weren’t exactly feeling the sympathy.

Stick to dancing 🕺… #XFactorCelebrity… the other one from the kids show no ones heard of is throwing a hissy fit … 😂😱😂 pic.twitter.com/srry9PPYj5 — Tony Gwenin (@TGwenin) October 12, 2019

And the Edwards guy actually raging saying they were nasty 😂😂👏 mate 👏 get 👏 a 👏 grip 😂😂 #XFactorCelebrity pic.twitter.com/yTre0cgD6I — Yazzy 🖤 (@SpazzyYazzy1990) October 12, 2019

#XFactorCelebrity oooh Jeremy Edwards touchy….what an attitude 😂 — Lisa (@looloo40) October 12, 2019

Cringing for brendon and Jeremy #XFactorCelebrity pic.twitter.com/7jwtLhGCCG — Lisa M M (@LisaMayle) October 12, 2019

Other contestants on the show included a Love Island supergroup, Glee’s Kevin McHale, and Martin Bashir who left everyone in tears.
